messages.content: I will be an MP who represents everyone, all of our communities and in all parts of West Bromwich West. Therefore, I am writing to you to ask for your support in the upcoming General Election on Thursday 12th December. Regards, James Cunningham. Let's elect James as a Labour MP for West Bromwich West on 12th December!

messages.title: Why James Cunningham is the best choice for West Bromwich West
messages.content: I've spent most of my life working in the NHS, have lived in this area all my life and I got involved in politics to help working class people and to protect our public services. I have seen the impact of the Tory government cuts to our public services and how this has impacted on hard working people and families. A Labour government will change this. Our NHS, Not. For. Sale! – It has been revealed, that the NHS is on the table for the US-UK trade deal, with “everything included”. That’s a green light for breaking open Britain’s public services so corporations can profit from them and your health! What will that mean for you? Let’s compare the price of medicine. The drug Humira for Crohn’s disease and rheumatoid arthritis costs our NHS £1,409 a packet. In the US, the same packet costs £8,115. We cannot let our hard-won rights, protections and freedoms erode by allowing Donald Trump to get his hands on our country. Labour will not let this happen. Unlike the Conservatives, we’re not on the side of the billionaires and bankers. We’re on the side of the nurse, the doctor, the patient and the people and will never sell out our National Health Service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will scrap hospital car-parking charges - you shouldn’t have to pay to visit your loved ones in hospital - and will scrap NHS prescription charges - so you and your loved ones get the medicines you need.
Labour will make sure that the winter fuel allowance, triple lock on pensions, bus pass and TV licences are kept for all pensioners.
Labour will train thousands more GPs to reduce waiting times for appointments.
Labour will introduce free personal care for older people as part of a fully-funded National Care Service. Funding care is a huge stress for people and Labour wants to bring that to an end.
Labour will compensate WASPI women unfairly denied their pension.
